Sentencas: Temperature gradient is a significant problem for the practical application of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs), which may lead to low power density and the degradation of SOFCs.
Titulo: Highly thermal integrated heat pipe-solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: In order to equalize the temperature distribution and improve the electrochemical performance, the concept of a heat pipe with liquid sodium metal is introduced into the design of SOFCs.
Titulo: Highly thermal integrated heat pipe-solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: A highly thermal integrated heat pipe-solid oxide fuel cell (HP-SOFC) was fabricated and investigated.
Titulo: Highly thermal integrated heat pipe-solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The HP-SOFC consists of a heat functional layer, a current-collecting layer, an anode layer, an electrolyte layer, and a cathode layer.
Titulo: Highly thermal integrated heat pipe-solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: For an extreme flame operation, the temperature gradient along the axis of the tubular SOFC decreases from 31 to 13 K/cm due to the high heat-transfer rate of the heat functional layer.
Titulo: Highly thermal integrated heat pipe-solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: For a single fuel cell, the power output is significantly improved by 65%, increasing from 73 to 120 mW/cm(2) at 0.6 V with a methane-rich flame at an equivalence ratio of 1.7.
Titulo: Highly thermal integrated heat pipe-solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: In addition, prospects for other possible applications of the HP-SOFC are discussed.
Titulo: Highly thermal integrated heat pipe-solid oxide fuel cell
